meanings.definition: An antibiotic used to treat various bacterial infections.
meanings.sent1: The doctor prescribed oxytetracycline to help fight the infection.
meanings.sent2: She took oxytetracycline as directed by the pharmacist.
meanings.sent3: The bacteria were scared of the oxytetracycline and ran away!
meanings.sent4: Oxytetracycline was like a superhero fighting off the bacterial villains.
meanings.sent5: The oxytetracycline worked tirelessly to defeat the harmful bacteria.

meanings.definition: A medication that belongs to the tetracycline class of antibiotics.
meanings.sent1: The oxytetracycline was stored in the medicine cabinet.
meanings.sent2: Many people rely on oxytetracycline to treat infections.
meanings.sent3: The oxytetracycline and its antibiotic friends had a party in the pharmacy.
meanings.sent4: In the world of antibiotics, oxytetracycline stood out like a bright star.
meanings.sent5: The pharmacist explained the benefits of oxytetracycline to the patient.
